snippet: Two men plunged off a ski slope while strapped into a zorb, an inflatable ball, earlier this month. The accident has generated concern over unlicensed attractions on Russia’s ski slopes.
abstract: Two men are killed after plunging off ski slope in Russia while strapped into inflatable ball, called a zorb; accident has generated concern over unlicensed attractions on Russia’s ski slopes.
lead_paragraph: Two men plunged off a ski slope while strapped into a zorb, an inflatable ball, earlier this month. The accident has generated concern over unlicensed attractions on Russia’s ski slopes.

headline.seo: Zorbing Accident Kills 1 Man and Injures Another in Russia
headline.main: Man in Plastic Ball Dies on Russian Ski Slope
headline.print_headline: Man in Plastic Ball Dies on Russian Ski Slope
